name: path-manager
title: Path Manager
description: Manage, search, and quickly open saved paths in the terminal.
author: Headrsh

preferences.name: defaultTerminal
preferences.description: Select your default terminal application to open paths.
preferences.title: Default Terminal Application

commands.name: add-path
commands.title: Add path
commands.description: Stores a file path with an alias for easy access later.

commands.name: list-paths
commands.title: List paths
commands.description: Display a list of all saved paths and their aliases.

commands.name: open-path
commands.title: Open path
commands.description: Opens a terminal tab navigating to the chosen path.

commands.name: remove-path
commands.title: Remove path
commands.description: Removes a path and its alias from the saved list.
